subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador surged to his first stage win of this year’s Giro d’Italia and took the leader’s pink jersey from Pieter Weening.
snippet: Alberto Contador surged to his first stage win of this year’s Giro d’Italia and took the leader’s pink jersey from Pieter Weening.
